quote: If you wanted, I would burn down the world for you.
author: Ana Huang

quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
author: Emily Brontë

quote: I have waited for this opportunity for more than half a century, to repeat to you once again my vow of eternal fidelity and everlasting love.
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: And all at once, summer collapsed into fall.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: So it's not gonna be easy. It's going to be really hard; we're gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: I have crossed oceans of time to find you.
author: Bram Stoker

quote: You have bewitched me, body and soul, and I love, I love, I love you.
author: Jane Austen

quote: I cannot let you burn me up, nor can I resist you. No mere human can stand in a fire and not be consumed.
author: A.S. Byatt

quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: I wish I could freeze this moment, right here, right now and live in it forever.
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known—and even that is an understatement.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: I love her and that's the beginning and end of everything.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: I would die for you. But I won't live for you.
author: Stephen Chbosky

quote: The very first moment I beheld him, my heart was irrevocably gone.
author: Jane Austen

quote: I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. But I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: You are my greatest adventure.
author: The Incredibles

quote: I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: I carry your heart with me. I carry it in my heart.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you... I could walk through my garden forever.
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
author: Roy Croft

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: I have waited for you for 2 years and I would wait for you for the rest of my life.
author: Ana Huang

quote: You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
author: Leo Christopher

quote: I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, then all at once.
author: John Green

quote: To be your friend was all I ever wanted; to be your lover was all I ever dreamed.
author: Valerie Lombardo

quote: You are the answer to every prayer I've offered. You are a song, a dream, a whisper, and I don't know how I could have lived without you for as long as I have.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: I would rather argue with you than kiss someone else.
author: Ana Huang

quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
author: Robert Heinlein

quote: You have been my friend. That in itself is a tremendous thing.
author: E.B. White

quote: I love you. I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: You are the best thing that's ever been mine.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Every atom of your flesh is as dear to me as my own: in pain and sickness it would still be dear.
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: I have loved you since we were eighteen, long before we both thought the same thoughts and felt the same feelings.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: You are, and always have been, my dream.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: I love you more than I have ever found a way to say to you.
author: Ben Folds

quote: You make me want to be a better person.
author: As Good as It Gets

quote: Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a choice, but falling in love with you was beyond my control.
author: Teresa Conroy

quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where, I love you simply, without problems or pride.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: You are my sun, my moon, and all of my stars.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: You are the piece of me I wish I didn't need.
author: Maya Banks

quote: You are the only exception to my carefully laid plans.
author: Colleen Hoover

quote: In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems.
author: Rumi

quote: I will love you until the stars go out, and the tides no longer turn.
author: Stephenie Meyer
